p: The susceptibility of 11 fish-derived cell lines was studied to determine the goldfish potential host range, in vitro viral fitness and optimal growth temperature as follows: common carp brain (CCB) (ECACC 10072802) [ 17], fathead minnow (FHM) (ATCC ® CCL-42™) [ 18], EPC, bluegill fibroblast (BF-2) (ATCC ® CCL-91™) [ 19], snakehead fry (E11) (ECACC 01110916) [ 20], striped snakehead fry (SSN-1) (ECACC no. 96082808) [ 21], chinook salmon embryo (CHSE-214) (ATCC ®: CRL-2872™) [ 22], rainbow trout gonads (RTG-2) (ATCC ® CCL-55) [ 23], rainbow trout gill (RTgill-W1) (ATCC ® CRL-2523) [ 24], koi carp fin (KF-1) (ECACC 10072801) [ 25] and grunt fin (GF) (ECACC 88010601) [ 26].
